text: Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu; ta de muqin, xinku de huai ta, xinku di sheng ta, ta shoutai he duan ru de shiqi, gongji sanshi ge yue. Dang ta dadao zhuangnian, zai dadao sishi sui de de hou, ta shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo ganxie ni suo shi yu wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bingxing ni suo xiyue de shanshi. Qiu ni wei wo gaishan wo de houyi. Wo que yi xiang ni huizui, wo que shi yige shunfu zhe.'
